about_the_game:
Who are we without our memories? Most of Maya's memories have faded, but a dream spirit offers to help her piece together her lost memories.

  • Mystery & Intrigue: Piece together the intricate dreams of Maya and discover her life story.

  • Flowing & wholesome: puzzle gameplay that feels flowing and wholesome.

  • Build Maya's Room: Transform Maya's room by unlocking keepsakes as you play.

  • Created by a BAFTA Nominated filmmaker.

PIECE TOGETHER INTRICATE DREAMS

A reimagination of jigsaw puzzles where instead of pictures you piece together Maya's story through her lost memories. The way you play matters. Lose yourself in layered, flowing, and wholesome gameplay that transforms as you play.

DISCOVER A STORY OF MYSTERY AND INTRIGUE

Piece together over 17 chapter of her life, discover her beautiful story. Discover a secret about her life that is filled with mystery and intrigue.

HELP MAYA REMEMBER HER LIFE

Collect memory shards and use it to transform Maya's room into a cosy space that reflects her beautiful full life. Help Maya discover that her life was never truly empty, but vibrant with meaning.

STORY

  • Each puzzle is a memory of Maya's that you piece together to form her life.

  • A story about belonging, love, loss and meaning.

  • A game that explores mental degeneration.

GAMEPLAY FEATURES

  • A reimagination of jigsaw puzzle games.

  • The way you connect pieces matter and affects the gameplay.

  • Earn resources, purchase and upgrade keepsakes to influence the gameplay.

  • Multi-layered wholesome sound and audio.

From the Dev

I started working on Emerge wanting to create a small experimental game that explores if a whole story could be expressed through a jigsaw puzzle. But two years in, it's turned into something a bit more personal. I'm a solo dev from Edinburgh, Scotland creating experimental games. I hope you enjoy Emerge. If you need any help with the game, please contact me on krish@vismaya.co.uk.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel core i3-2100T @ 2.5GHz/AMD FX 6100, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650Ti 2GB, AMD Radeon HD 7750 2GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570K; AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960; AMD R9 290 or equivalent
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Uncover a beautiful story through a different kind of jigsaw puzzle where you piece together Maya's lost memories. Watch as her empty room transforms into a cosy, meaningful space filled with treasured keepsakes as you uncover her beautiful life.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
